column4: is breezy going to have the firefox beagle plugin by default?
Of course, you need to have the required language kit installed.
Do you have that set in the LANG and LOCALE vars too?
It's an interesting pice of fud, isn't it? Nowhere do they mention that content applies to the US only.
... or that they were told that region locking DVD players is actually not permitted in Australia for instance.
We now have something of that sort here (a worse one than the US) but it's still not illegal to use DeCSS to watch your DVDs on Linux (or format-shift them to say an iPod)
The "But don't you want Linux users to watch DVDs" is a nice one. What with them not answering the actual question <heh>
